response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask of grasping the carton of milk. The robot now has the carton of milk in its inventory. The next subtask is to move the robot to the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Move the robot to the carton of milk.
(4) Grasp the carton of milk.
(5) Move the robot to the fridge.
(6) Put the carton of milk inside the fridge.
(7) Close the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
